author: tomwhite
msg: Merge -r 541782:541783 from trunk to 0.13 branch. Fixes: HADOOP-1411.

author: imario
msg: added a connection proxy to fix the problem where the ORM might not pass a db connection back to the pool if there was a lazy-init during the render response phase.
It depends on the environment if the user requires this "hack" or not.

author: tomwhite
msg: HADOOP-1411.  Make task retry framework handle AlreadyBeingCreatedException when wrapped as a RemoteException.  Contributed by Hairong Kuang.
